meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of necromancy
meanings.sent1: The old book contained dark and necromantic spells.
meanings.sent2: The necromantic ritual was performed under the full moon.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled nervously at the necromantic costume.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a necromantic gaze that seemed to see beyond.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house had a necromantic atmosphere that sent shivers down spines.

meanings.sent1: The seance was a necromantic event where spirits were summoned.
meanings.sent2: The necromantic medium claimed to speak to departed souls.
meanings.sent3: The necromantic phone call from beyond was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were filled with necromantic conversations with ancestors.
meanings.sent5: The necromantic whispers in the cemetery echoed through the night.

meanings.definition: having to do with magic or sorcery involving the dead
meanings.sent1: The necromantic potion glowed eerily in the dark room.
meanings.sent2: Legends spoke of a necromantic curse that haunted the village.
meanings.sent3: The necromantic wand was said to bring back lost souls.
meanings.sent4: The necromantic symbols on the tombstone seemed to pulse with energy.
meanings.sent5: The necromantic incantation echoed through the ancient ruins.
